sqlMap.select: select count(id) from member where id=#id#
select substr(zipcode, 1, instr(zipcode, '-') - 1) zip1, substr(zipcode, instr(zipcode, '-') + 1) zip2, sido, gugun, dong, nvl(bunji, ' ') bunji from zipcode where dong like '%'||#dong#||'%'
sqlMap.insert: insert all into member (id, name, pass, email1, email2) values (#id#, #name#, #pass#, #email1#, #email2#) into member_detail (id, tel1, tel2, tel3, zip1, zip2, addr1, addr2, joindate) values (#id#, #tel1#, #tel2#, #tel3#, #zip1#, #zip2#, #addr1#, #addr2#, sysdate) select * from dual
sqlMap.select: select * from member m, member_detail md where m.id=md.id and m.id=#id#
